full_threads.body:
Hi Sean,

Sure, we have triggered the email.
Let me know if you have received it?

Hi Joel,

We have just seen that an order has come through from Everlypropertystyling@gmail.com at some point today but we haven't received our usual email PDF of their order so we can see what furniture they have selected.

Are you able to find the email? I have attached the PDF that we have in the system but as you will see it doesn't have the furniture they selected on it just generic pictures of stock.

Thanks,

SEAN + THE TEAM AT HUNTLEY + CO
02 8310 2285
